General.Name: Lisgrafica
General.Description: Lisgráfica - Impressão e Artes Gráficas, S.A. provides printing services in Portugal. It prints magazines, newspapers, supplements, catalogs, brochures, and telephone directories. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Agualva-Cacém, Portugal. Lisgrafica-Impressao e Artes Graficas is a subsidiary of Rasográfica - Comércio e Serviços Gráficos, S.A.
General.Address: Estrada de S. Marcos, N 27, Agualva-Cacém, Portugal, 2735-521
